messages.active_requests:

messages.bc:
Enter {} you want to broadcast:

Use /cancel to cancel operation.
messages.bc_prompt:
How to use broadcast types. You can send the following kind of messages as broadcasts

üëâ text - Send written text broadcast to all users
üëâ photo - Send a photo with/without caption as broadcast.
üëâ video - Send a video clip (must be less than 50mb) as broadcast with/without caption
üëâ animation - Send short animated gif as broadcast with/without caption.

To proceed, type in the message you would like to broadcast in the tab below. Note that once you hit send, your message (text/image/audio) will be sent to ALL users on this platform so be cautious!

Use /cancel to cancel operation.

messages.counselor_request_start:
Please follow these four steps in the right order to ensure your counseling request is scheduled correctly.

1Ô∏è‚É£ - Contact Information
First you will be asked to provide your name, email, and phone number in a particular order.

2Ô∏è‚É£ - Location
Next, you will need to confirm your CCI branch or the nearest one to you.

3Ô∏è‚É£ - Note
You will be asked to provide a short note to give the counselor a sense of what you would like to discuss.

 Please follow the prompts in the right order to ensure a smooth processüôè.

Thank you for your patience and cooperation ü§©.

Use /cancel to cancel the operation at any time.
messages.counseling_feedback_prompt:

1 - Not Satisfactory

Please type in the attribute and value you would like to search for.

 first_name:John

messages.help:
You can now use BUTTONS or the COMMAND MENU to pass commands to the bot.
Here's how the buttons below work

üëâ latest sermon - This gives you the most recent sermon available on the [website](http://ccing.org/sermons/)

üëâ get sermon - This helps you get a specific sermon by it's title. You can search using the exact title or a keyword.
Searching for a keyword (e.g Grace) would give you all sermon containing the keyword in their titles.

üëâ devotional - Get today's devotional

üëâ map - This helps you find the nearest MAP centre to your location.

You can other perform other commands using the COMMAND MENU.
These commands include:
‚Ä¢ /cancel - Cancel any existing action‚úñÔ∏è
‚Ä¢ /menu - Get the default keyboard‚å®Ô∏è
‚Ä¢ /membership - Register for membership schoolüè´
‚Ä¢ /newsletter - Subscribe to the CCI Newsletterüóû
‚Ä¢ /mute - Mute notifications from CCI Botüòî
‚Ä¢ /unmute - Unmute bot notificationsü§©
